name: S.O.S Crab Grab
description:
You're marooned on a tropical island!

Run to fill the holes with coconuts, to write an S.O.S to your saviours before they fly away!

Beware of the  pesky crabs: they are constantly trying to ruin your job!

Maybe they won't save you this time, but they will surely drop some food and shoes-- how many days will you survive?

CARGO CULT GALORE! Controls:
  • X = grab / drop coconut
  • Z = kick the crabs

Game development by IDecade & Frash Pikass
